page.title: 13 A VILLAGE EVENT
page.content: A barbecue was held in the Rectory garden on Friday 13th July at 7.30pm. It was to raise money for repairs to the church roof and some proceeds to charity. It was a pleasant evening and about 40 people were present. The food consisted of hot dogs and beefburgers cooked by Mrs Hall and Mrs Bunn, afterwards there was strawberries and cream. There was also a stall selling drinks. There were several games with prizes for the winners. Each entry ticket had a number on it which was drawn for a prize. There was also a raffle. At 10.15pm it began to get dark and the barbecue was brought to a close.
